channel.title: Pk Desert Client
channel.description:
when i get the file downloaded then i try to open then a window appears saying this... "Windows cannot open this file :File Pk_Desert_client[1].rar To open this file, Windows needs to no what program created it. windows can go online and look it up automaticlly, or you can just manually select from a list of programs on your computer What do you wish to do? (dot) Use the Web service to find an appropite (pardon my spelling error) program (dot) select programs from a list
[ok] [cancel]"
Someone help me please pm me or post

item.title: Pk Desert Client
item.dc:creator: @Paradise_God Paradise God
item.description:
@Paradise_God wrote:

Then why are you downloading WinRAR?

To get on a client, Your just enter the clients Server IP Address and Server port.

And enter there Hamachi network.

Simple.

Read full topic

item.title: Pk Desert Client
item.dc:creator: @Paradise_God Paradise God
item.description:
@Paradise_God wrote:

Open your Source file, Double click Runserver.bat (On mine it doesn’t have .bet at the end, But I use Evil-Scape source, It could be different)

Then a box should open up, saying Server running on port: 0.0.0.0:(Your port here)
[ Something like that anyway ]

And your IP is the big number’s at the top of your hamachi.

For other people to join your server, Make a Hamachi network.

Also, You should use your Port to get on server’s too.

Read full topic
